duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and maintain excellent relationships with partners, carriers, and vendors.
Manage incoming email, mail, and calls from clients, lenders, and insurance company personnel.
Process changes, follow up with clients via email, and maintain client profiles and policies in the client management system.
Process policies as new business, renewals, or rewrites, and obtain quotes from a company to present to the client.
Accept payments from insureds, counsel clients on coverage and limits, and provide proactive risk management support.
Provide renewal summaries of insurance, check new policies for accuracy, and follow up on late payments.
Review monthly statements from accounting and contact clients if late for agency bill policies.
Cover the desk of those on vacation or out sick for time-sensitive work, volunteer assistance to others in the department, and work efficiently in a team environment.
Project a positive attitude toward company goals, apply problem solving techniques to various issues, and utilize intuitive behaviors to work with various personalities and styles.
Pursue a program for professional development consistent with the position.
Visit clients at home or office on larger accounts, when necessary, and cover other duties as assigned.

education_certification.credential: CISR designation or other advanced designation preferred
